text: Soni naga asimene ni aŵala ŵaakulupilile, akasatiji: “Tukulupilile (yanti Muhammadi ﷺ Ntume nsyesyene soni jukolanjidwe mu itabu yetu.)” Nambo pati atemi achimisyenepe pakasyepela akasatiji: “Ana nkwatagulila ŵanganyao yammanyisye Allah (mu Taurat) kuti akan'gomeche nayo kwa M'mbuje gwenu, ana ŵangali lunda?”
